name: Monaxiá
description:
Monaxiá is a first person survival/exploration game which takes places on a deserted island. You are in control of the lone survivor of a shipwreck,who has a hard time remembering his past. Uncover the mystery of the island and seek the truth of your past.

Monaxia was created at the 48 hour Master/Jr BUG GameJam event.
